title: Pilot
description: Michael Taylor and Joey Harris who were friends 13 years ago, are informed that a girl they both dated, passed away and they're named in her will. And what she left them is her 12 year old daughter Nicole and one of them is the father. While Michael is hesitant, Joey takes her. But as soon as they get to his place, he has to go somewhere, leaving her alone. And Michael shows up telling him off and they get into it.

title: Soho's by You?
description: Michael and Joey have a disagreement over where to live, decide to split up and then compromise by incorporating Michael's environment in Joey's loft.

title: Crime and Punishment
description: Michael and Joey's contrasting methods as parents are put to the test when Nicole deceives her two fathers about her plans for the evening.

title: Nicole's First Date
description: After Nicole is stood up on her first date, Joey and Michael visit the boy, discover the problem and help remedy it.

title: Friends and Lovers
description: After Michael's date abandons him, Nicole tries to set him up with their neighbor, only to learn they have nothing in common.

title: Whose Night Is It, Anyway?
description: Michael and Joey, without a babysitter for Nicole, bring their dates home only to throw than out when they prove to be bad models for Nicole.

title: Once a Son
description: Joey's father, who has always been disappointed with his son's choice of careers, visits Joey's first art exhibit and challenges Joey to sell a painting or work in the family plumbing business.

title: Sex, Judge, and Rock & Roll
description: Michael meets an attractive, intelligent woman and spends a romantic evening with her, but he is shocked to learn she is Judge Wilbur's engaged niece.

title: The Artful Dodger
description: Nicole is afraid to fail at art, because that might mean Joey isn't her father.

title: Quality Time
description: Michael feels guilty when the responsibility of his career prohibits him from being the kind of parent he would like to be to Nicole.

title: 'Tis the Season
description: At Christmas, it requires ingenuity on the part of Michael and Joey to help Nicole overcome the sadness of missing her mother.

title: The Only Child
description: Nicole tries to manipulate her fathers by complaining about being an only child, but the ploy backfires when they get her a little brother.

title: Joey's Mother-In-Law
description: When Michael's mother comes for a surprise visit, she and her traditional parenting philosophies wreak havoc with the family's unusual but happy homelife.

title: Nicole in Charge
description: Nicole is sure she's going to lose another family member when the guys overdo a physical fitness regime.

title: The Wedge
description: Joey and Michael clash when Joey's friend Malcolm, a rock singer, accuses Joey of being a stuffed shirt and says Nicole should have more freedom.

title: Advice and Consent
description: Cory and Nicole face the first test of growing up when Cory's brother tries to push him into making romantic overtures.

title: She'll Get Over It
description: Nicole's dreams of a modeling career are shattered when she's passed over at her first casting call.

title: Michael's Sister Comes Over and Visits
description: When Michael's adventuresome sister pays him a visit after a long separation, he tries to stop doting and accept her for the free spirit she is.

title: Nicole's Big Adventure
description: Michael and Joey have difficulty allowing Nicole to attend a week long camping outing.

title: My Fair Joey
description: Joey enlists Michael to coach him on the finer points of etiquette when he meets a debutante dream girl.

title: The Family in Question
description: When a reporter does a story on the judge, criticizing her decisions most specifically her decision to put Nicole with Joey and Michael. They want his head. But a television reporter offers to do a story and let the public decide on her decision.

title: Blast from the Past
description: Zach, a boy whom Nicole knew moves to New York and comes to see her. And Cory is not comfortable with her being with him.

title: Who's on First?
description: When Nicole asks her more experienced girlfriend for kissing tips, Michael and Joey prepare for a fathers daughter talk by enrolling in a sexuality awareness seminar attended by a group of angry women over 30.

title: Macho, Stupid Guy Time
description: With Nicole away for the weekend, Michael and Joey resume a 15 year old bet that one of them can get their high school "no" queen of all time to say "yes" to a date.

title: The Man in the Pink Slip
description: Lifestyles and temperaments change dramatically in the Taylor/Harris household when Michael loses his job and Joey goes to work.

title: Fallen Idol
description: A visit from her rock and roll idol Malcolm O'Dell leaves Nicole star-struck until the musician loses his music making ability.

title: Story with a Twist
description: When 14 year old Nicole comes home with liquor on her breath, the Dads employ their own brand of shock therapy: a vivid and frightening demonstration of the dangers of alcohol abuse.

title: Playing with Fire
description: When a man whom the judge sent to prison sends her death threats, she's assigned someone to protect her--Bull Shannon from Night Court.

title: Dirty Dating
description: Nicole rebels when Joey ignores her objections to his dating a hot but condescending woman. Her revenge? She goes out with every fathers nightmare someone named Chopper.

title: The God of Love
description: When Nicole finds Joey in bed with a woman, her public bragging fuels Joey's already red hot reputation and gives Nicole, by association, a red hot reputation of her own.

title: In Her Dreams
description: Through a series of dreams, Nicole has a chance to see what life would have been like if her mother had married either Michael or Joey.

title: Together We Stand
description: Michael is excited and Joey apprehensive as they begin their jobs together at a new financial magazine, but emotions mix when they meet their boss, Karen, an attractive and assertive woman.

title: The Courtship of Nicole's Fathers
description: In order to distract her over protective dads, Nicole introduce then to a beautiful new neighbor.

title: Crushed
description: Shelby's crush on Michael wreaks havoc in her friendship with Nicole, then leads to heartbreak when Shelby mistakes a casual conversation for a romantic overture.

title: Basket Case
description: When Nicole fails to make the basketball team, Joey confronts her coach who turns out to be a very competitive woman both on and off the court.

title: You Love Me, Right?
description: Michael's uncle shows up and he's not exactly pleased to see him. It seems he has a habit of making promises that he doesn't keep. And he's making some to Nicole.

title: Getting Smart
description: Nicole decides to drop out of an advanced English class - with best friend Shelby's encouragement, after overhearing Michael and Joey disdainfully discussing their "smart" boss, Karen.

title: That's No Lady, That's My Mother
description: Michael is dating Zach's recently divorced mother. And despite being told by Joey that he's the man whom she is seeing to get over her break up, he continues to see her. And it causes problems for Nicole and Zach.

title: Love and Learn
description: Nicole is dating a slightly older guy. When the guys hear about this, they forbid her to see him. She sneaks out to see him. They follow her and discover her getting her heart broken.

title: You Can Count on Me
description: Shelby is dating a guy whom Nicole says is a creep. But Shelby ignores her. So to prove it to her, Nicole goes on a double date with them and the guy's friend. And sure enough his true self comes out but Shelby finds it hard to accept.

title: Duel
description: It's the homecoming dance at Nicole's school. And the teacher in charge goes to see Joey and Michael to see if they have any suggestions. They're both taken with her and they come up with a girls asking out the boys. And Nicole finds herself in a delicate position cause this where she decides if she wants to be with Cory or Zach. And when she makes her choice, someone else asks him out.

title: I'm Dreaming of a Holiday Episode
It's My Art, and I'll Die If I Want To
To Thine Own Elf Be True
You Only Surprise the Ones You Love
description: When Wilbur is about to receive an honor, the guys feeling as if that some of her friends and family should be there decides to do a little snooping. They learn of a guy who appears to be a friend, so they invite him without telling Wilbur. When he arrives he assumes she knew and when she sees him, she tells him to go. That's when she reveals that he's her ex-husband.

title: When You Wish...
description: A TV show offers to give a viewer a chance to go out with a music star. And to insure that the viewer's parents approve, they offer to give the parents to live out their dream. And for Joey is to play pro basketball and what they offer him is a chance to play one on one with his idol Dr. J. And for Michael is to perform on piano. Things seem to be OK except Zach doesn't like it.

title: See You in September?
description: Joey's ex comes back to town to marry someone else but he's not over her yet.
